877470.name: Rage of the Pumpkins - Space Prostitutes Must Die! Again
877470.description:
You were a regular forestman. While you were walking with your girlfriend cowgirl to her home the mutant pumpkins attacked! They ate your girlfriend and bitten you a couple of times! The girl was fat so it's no big deal, but you lost a half of your butt!
Show them the mother of Kuz'ma, don't let these evil pumpkins interventionists drink your hooch!


Entourage is typical for the 80's horror-movies! Dread, shouts and death are at every step.


It looks like a typical 90's shooter, nevertheless, it has a unique idea! With this game out there is a new standart for AAA-projects!
